project_audit.summary: Procedural logic prioritized over LLM calls for routing. Strict infrastructure isolation via Wrangler.

gaps.description: Validation is still rudimentary. While JSON is parsed, semantic validation of the logic (e.g. checking if the Gherkin actually matches the PRD) is missing.
gaps.suggested_fix: Add a dedicated 'Validation' step that uses a lightweight LLM (Gemini Flash) to cross-reference outputs against the PRD before finalizing.

gaps.description: Frontend generation currently outputs text descriptions. It does not generate runnable code or previewable React components.
gaps.suggested_fix: Integrate a sandboxed preview environment (e.g., Sandpack) to render the LLM-generated React code directly in the 'PaperModal'.

gaps.description: The worker implementation mocks the LLM providers (OpenAI/Anthropic classes return static strings).
gaps.suggested_fix: Implement actual REST API calls for OpenAI and Anthropic in 'worker/index.ts'.
